Swimming Pool.english: 1. The swimming pool is open all year round.
Swimming Pool.italian: La piscina è aperta tutto l'anno.
Swimming Pool.spanish: La piscina está abierta todo el año.
Swimming Pool.german: Das Schwimmbad ist ganzjährig geöffnet.

Swimming Pool.english: 2. I love swimming in the pool.
Swimming Pool.italian: Amo nuotare in piscina.
Swimming Pool.spanish: Me encanta nadar en la piscina.
Swimming Pool.german: Ich liebe es, im Schwimmbad zu schwimmen.

Swimming Pool.english: 3. The lifeguard is watching the pool.
Swimming Pool.italian: Il bagnino sta sorvegliando la piscina.
Swimming Pool.spanish: El socorrista está vigilando la piscina.
Swimming Pool.german: Der Bademeister beobachtet das Schwimmbad.

Swimming Pool.english: 4. The pool water is refreshing.
Swimming Pool.italian: L'acqua della piscina è rinfrescante.
Swimming Pool.spanish: El agua de la piscina es refrescante.
Swimming Pool.german: Das Wasser im Schwimmbad ist erfrischend.

Swimming Pool.english: 5. We are having a pool party tomorrow.
Swimming Pool.italian: Faremo una festa in piscina domani.
Swimming Pool.spanish: Vamos a tener una fiesta en la piscina mañana.
Swimming Pool.german: Wir machen morgen eine Poolparty.

Swimming Pool.english: 6. The swimming pool has a diving board.
Swimming Pool.italian: La piscina ha un trampolino.
Swimming Pool.spanish: La piscina tiene un trampolín.
Swimming Pool.german: Das Schwimmbad hat ein Sprungbrett.

Swimming Pool.english: 7. Swimming lessons are available at the pool.
Swimming Pool.italian: Lezioni di nuoto sono disponibili in piscina.
Swimming Pool.spanish: Hay clases de natación disponibles en la piscina.
Swimming Pool.german: Schwimmunterricht wird im Schwimmbad angeboten.

Swimming Pool.english: 8. The pool is filled with clear blue water.
Swimming Pool.italian: La piscina è riempita con acqua blu limpida.
Swimming Pool.spanish: La piscina está llena de agua azul clara.
Swimming Pool.german: Das Schwimmbad ist mit klarem blauem Wasser gefüllt.

Swimming Pool.english: 9. I enjoy sunbathing by the pool.
Swimming Pool.italian: Mi piace prendere il sole vicino alla piscina.
Swimming Pool.spanish: Disfruto tomar el sol junto a la piscina.
Swimming Pool.german: Ich genieße es, mich am Schwimmbad zu sonnen.

Swimming Pool.english: 10. The pool area has comfortable lounge chairs.
Swimming Pool.italian: L'area della piscina ha comode sedie a sdraio.
Swimming Pool.spanish: El área de la piscina tiene cómodas tumbonas.
Swimming Pool.german: Der Poolbereich hat bequeme Liegestühle.

Swimming Pool.english: 11. The pool temperature is perfect for swimming.
Swimming Pool.italian: La temperatura della piscina è perfetta per nuotare.
Swimming Pool.spanish: La temperatura de la piscina es perfecta para nadar.
Swimming Pool.german: Die Wassertemperatur im Schwimmbad ist ideal zum Schwimmen.

Swimming Pool.english: 12. We need to clean the pool filters.
Swimming Pool.italian: Dobbiamo pulire i filtri della piscina.
Swimming Pool.spanish: Tenemos que limpiar los filtros de la piscina.
Swimming Pool.german: Wir müssen die Poolfilter reinigen.

Swimming Pool.english: 13. The pool is deep enough for diving.
Swimming Pool.italian: La piscina è abbastanza profonda per tuffarsi.
Swimming Pool.spanish: La piscina es lo suficientemente profunda para bucear.
Swimming Pool.german: Das Schwimmbad ist tief genug zum Tauchen.

Swimming Pool.english: 14. The swimming pool is surrounded by palm trees.
Swimming Pool.italian: La piscina è circondata da palme.
Swimming Pool.spanish: La piscina está rodeada de palmeras.
Swimming Pool.german: Das Schwimmbad ist von Palmen umgeben.

Swimming Pool.english: 15. The pool is equipped with a water slide.
Swimming Pool.italian: La piscina è dotata di uno scivolo d'acqua.
Swimming Pool.spanish: La piscina está equipada con un tobogán acuático.
Swimming Pool.german: Das Schwimmbad ist mit einer Wasserrutsche ausgestattet.

Swimming Pool.english: 16. Children must be accompanied by an adult at the pool.
Swimming Pool.italian: I bambini devono essere accompagnati da un adulto in piscina.
Swimming Pool.spanish: Los niños deben estar acompañados por un adulto en la piscina.
Swimming Pool.german: Kinder müssen im Schwimmbad von einem Erwachsenen begleitet werden.

Swimming Pool.english: 17. The pool has a shallow end for kids.
Swimming Pool.italian: La piscina ha una parte bassa per i bambini.
Swimming Pool.spanish: La piscina tiene una zona poco profunda para los niños.
Swimming Pool.german: Das Schwimmbad hat ein flaches Ende für Kinder.

Swimming Pool.english: 18. I need to put on sunscreen before going to the pool.
Swimming Pool.italian: Devo mettere la crema solare prima di andare in piscina.
Swimming Pool.spanish: Necesito ponerme protector solar antes de ir a la piscina.
Swimming Pool.german: Ich muss mich vor dem Schwimmbadbesuch eincremen.

Swimming Pool.english: 19. The pool is located next to the gym.
Swimming Pool.italian: La piscina si trova accanto alla palestra.
Swimming Pool.spanish: La piscina está ubicada junto al gimnasio.
Swimming Pool.german: Das Schwimmbad befindet sich neben dem Fitnessstudio.

Swimming Pool.english: 20. Swimming in the pool helps me relax.
Swimming Pool.italian: Nuotare in piscina mi aiuta a rilassarmi.
Swimming Pool.spanish: Nadar en la piscina me ayuda a relajarme.
Swimming Pool.german: Das Schwimmen im Schwimmbad hilft mir beim Entspannen.
